solution_line_template: If the number of homes on one side of the main road is three times the number on the other side, there are {multiplier}*{houses_one_side} = <<{multiplier}*{houses_one_side}={houses_other_side}>>{houses_other_side} homes.
In total, there are {houses_one_side}+{houses_other_side} = <<{houses_one_side}+{houses_other_side}={total_homes}>>{total_homes} homes in Mariam's neighborhood
